						 From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia 
					 
					 
					
					
					 
 
 
 Wikimedia Commons has media related to  Shōwa era . 
 
 This category collects articles on Japan in the  Shōwa era  (25 December 1926–7 January 1989).
